title: Audit leading triathlon and adjacent brands
description: Study training, bike, nutrition, and apparel leaders (Feisty Media, TriDot, Canyon, Precision Fuel, On, etc.) to extract positioning cues for our Phase 1 build.

2026-02-23T06:44:57.296614+01:00: Expanded audit to cover World Triathlon, Supertri, PTO/T100, GTN, 220 Triathlon, Roka, FORM, Whoop, Tonal, CrossFit/Peloton/F1/Strava, plus monetization snapshot.

title: Draft Phase 1 brand brief and content strategy
description: Consolidate audit insights into a positioning guide covering voice, pillars, and launch content plan.

2026-02-23T06:25:27.138637+01:00: Drafted task-5/brand-brief.md covering positioning, personas, pillars, offer architecture, and launch plan.

title: Prepare detailed line-item budget
description: Refine initial estimates into a precise cost breakdown for stack, tools, and paid experiments.

title: Create high-value lead magnet
description: Build the 12-week sub-5h half-Iron plan with fueling matrix for email capture.

title: Build email automation funnel
description: Implement nurturing sequence that converts lead magnet signups into premium offerings.

title: Produce flagship long-form content pillars
description: Create cornerstone guides (Ironman readiness blueprint, fueling calculators, masters power benchmarks).

title: Launch weekly pro insights newsletter
description: Set up and publish a recurring newsletter delivering training tips, gear reviews, and data deep dives.

title: Publish short-form social clips
description: Repurpose long-form content into daily social posts across IG/Threads/LinkedIn.

title: Develop tiered training plans
description: Ship novice/intermediate/advanced plans with integrated calculators and checklists.

title: Design premium membership offering
description: Define benefits, community access, async Q&A, and data tools for a paid membership.

title: Execute Month 1 growth plan
description: Deliver free content cadence plus lead magnet push to grow list and social presence.

title: Execute Month 2 monetization plan
description: Launch paid training plans ($59–$129) and supporting toolkits.

title: Execute Month 3 membership plan
description: Release $29–$49/mo membership with exclusive content, challenges, and sponsor deals.

title: Present plan and budget for approval
description: Package the Phase 1 plan plus detailed budget for Boss review and sign-off.

title: Migrate workspace to cloud repo + hosting
description: Create GitHub repository, push current project, and configure free static hosting (GitHub Pages/Netlify) so work persists when local machine sleeps.

title: Plan always-on cloud gateway deployment
description: Evaluate zero/low-cost options (VPS, spare hardware) and draft a migration plan so the OpenClaw gateway can run 24/7 without relying on the local laptop.

title: Define differentiated positioning narrative
description: Synthesize audit/brief insights into a conviction statement: what TriClaw brings to triathlon that no one else does, the narrative arc, and proof points.
progress_log: 2026-02-23T06:48:57.304626: Created task-20 and kicked off positioning manifesto in task-20/positioning-manifesto.md
